resources.string:
Fill the grid from 1 to 100

 Your next move can only be on a cell that is :
 - Spaced by two cells vertically
 - Spaced by two cells horizontally
 - Spaced by one cell in diagonal
 - Not already filled
Are you sure you wish to restart the game ?
A small game with a very easy principle: fill the grid from 1 to 100
